name: Nicole Portillo
coverLetter: I have been trimming since 2/2017. I was taught by top shelf trimmers. I have a Part time trim job that I trim for monthly for about 3 to 5 days depends on how much they have to trim. My current rate I get paid is 17.50 an hour with my part time. I'm looking for a full time position. I can work mornings, afternoons Ignore and weekends. I can bring my own food and chair and scissors. I am reliable and ready to work.
